title: My Application Isn’t Submitting
description: Are you shore? Take a second look at your application and be sure you’ve filled out all the required fields. Also check for any error messages!

title: I Made a Mistake on my Application
description: It happens! Send us an email to upe@fiu.edu and we’ll get it sorted right away!

title: I Found A Bug
description: Oof... Our junior developers did it again! Feel free to open an issue on our GitHub and we’ll get to work!

title: I Have Questions
description: Contact us on our Discord server or send us an email to upe@fiu.edu
